channel.title: society on Daniel Roelfs
channel.description: Recent content in society on Daniel Roelfs

item.title: Visualizing the State of the Amsterdam Housing Market
item.description: body { background-color: #EBEBEB; /* was #EFEFEF */ } table { font-family: "Nunito Sans", sans-serif; } code { background: #E0E0E0; } img { max-width: 80%; } # Setup of the environment library(tidyverse) library(ggtext) library(magrittr) library(showtext) font_add_google(name = "Nunito Sans", family = "nunito-sans") showtext_auto() theme_set(ggthemes::theme_economist(base_family = "nunito-sans") + theme(rect = element_rect(fill = "#EBEBEB", color = "transparent"), plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#EBEBEB", color = "transparent"), panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#EBEBEB", color = "transparent"), plot.
